review: I was pleasantly surprised by the PENJOY Universal Joycon Charging Grip. The design is ergonomic and comfortable, making long gaming sessions a breeze. The ability to charge two Joy-Cons simultaneously with a single USB-C cable is a game changer. The build quality is sturdy and well-made, and it works seamlessly with my Joy-Con cases. The only minor drawback is the lack of visual charging indicators, but overall, this grip is a must-have for any Nintendo Switch owner.
